title: Bangladesh News Articles Dataset
subtitle: Daily scraped news from 74+ major Bangladeshi newspapers (English & Bangla)
description:
A comprehensive collection of news articles from major Bangladeshi newspapers, automatically updated daily via GitHub Actions.

## ðŸ“° Content

This dataset contains news articles scraped from 74+ Bangladeshi newspapers including:
- **English**: Prothom Alo, Daily Star, BD News 24, Dhaka Tribune, TBS News, UNB
- **Bangla**: Jugantor, Samakal, Jago News 24, Rising BD, Naya Diganta, Manab Zamin

## ðŸ“‚ Files

| File | Format | Description |
|------|--------|-------------|
| `articles.json` | JSON | All articles with full metadata |
| `articles.csv` | CSV | Tabular format for easy analysis |
| `articles.xlsx` | Excel | Native Excel format |
| `articles.parquet` | Parquet | Compressed columnar format for big data tools |

## ðŸ“‹ Columns

- `headline` - Article title/headline
- `sub_title` - Article subtitle (if available)
- `article_body` - Full article text
- `url` - Original article URL
- `publication_date` - When the article was published
- `category` - News category (Politics, Sports, Business, etc.)
- `paper_name` - Source newspaper name
- `scraped_at` - When the article was scraped

## ðŸŽ¯ Use Cases

- **NLP Tasks**: Sentiment analysis, text classification, summarization
- **Topic Modeling**: Discover trending topics in Bangladeshi news
- **Named Entity Recognition**: Extract people, places, organizations
- **Language Modeling**: Train Bengali language models
- **Media Analysis**: Compare coverage across newspapers

## ðŸ”„ Updates

This dataset is **automatically updated daily** at 12:00 PM Bangladesh Time via GitHub Actions.

## ðŸ“¦ Source

Data collected using [BDNewsPaperScraper](https://github.com/EhsanulHaqueSiam/BDNewsPaperScraper) - the largest open-source Bangladeshi news scraping project.
